Entries.danceRejection: You'd ask an old lady like me to dance? What do you take me for?$4
Entries.Mon8: I had Penny pretty young... I'm glad she turned out okay.$s
Entries.Tue8: Penny's father...?$s#$e#...It's a long story. We all do stupid things when we're young, right?$s
Entries.Wed10: Hey, @. Just here for a visit?$h
Entries.Thu8: I don't know why you waste your time talking to an old hag like me...$s
Entries.Fri10: You're really somethin', you know that, @?
Entries.Sat8: Penny never goes out to the saloon...#$e#I'm glad. A smart girl like her has better things to do than go out and drink like a fish every night.$s
Entries.Sat10: Hey. Glad you're here.$h#$e#Stay a while.
Entries.Sun10: Hey... come visit me tomorrow. Penny'll be out teachin' the kiddos.#$e#We can be all alone.$7

Entries.give_flowersA: A bouquet!$5#$b#All right. If an old woman like me is good enough for you...$7
Entries.give_flowersB: ...! I accept!$5#$b#I still think I'm too old for you.$2#$b#But I'm sure we'll make it work.$5
Entries.give_pendant: Yes! Of course yes!$h#$b#I'll go talk to Lewis about gettin things set up.$5#$b#Penny'll have to get used to having a new stepdad^Penny'll have to get used to having a new stepmom.$7
Entries.stardrop_gift: 'Hey, hun, can you talk for a second?$6#$b#I wanted to give you this stardrop. Gus helped me pick it out.$5#$b#Really taught me a thing or two about love.$7
Entries.rejectNPCA: What's this for?$4#$b#Look kid, I appreciate the gesture but I'm too old and drunk for ya.#$b#Go find yourself someone closer to your age.$h
Entries.rejectNPCB: Those are not something you can give to me... buzz off kid.$4
Entries.reject_two_heartA: That's sweet, but I don't like you like that.$6
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Aren't we both farmers? How would you suggest we run them both?$h
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Pretty sure you're closer to my daughter's age, kid.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Not lookin for another mistake, kid.$2
Entries.engageA: Aren't you getting married?  You shouldn't be handing this off to just anyone.
Entries.engageB: Marriage is something special... don't mess it up.$4
Entries.marriedA: Don't be messing around behind your spouse's back.$4
Entries.marriedB: Where are you finding these pendants...$2
Entries.refusal_knownA: Kid, save that for someone who'll take care of you right.
Entries.refusal_knownB: Listen kid. You know better than to go after a lush.
Entries.refusal_botherA: Can ya stop? This isn't funny anymore.$3
Entries.refusal_botherB: No means no! How are you not getting that!?$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Not that I don't appreciate this, but I would feel like I'm robbin' the cradle.$2
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I'm not lookin' to get married, kid.  Go find yourself someone special.

Entries.give_flowersA: It's not gonna make me love you more than I already do, ya know?$5
Entries.give_flowersB: I actually like these. Kinda pretty. Thanks, snookums.$5
Entries.give_pendant: Haha, I've already got the one from before.
Entries.engageB: I only need the one, hun.$6
Entries.marriedA: You askin for a second wedding? Well... I supposed I don't mind.$7
Entries.marriedB: Where are you finding these pendants, snookums?$6

Entries.Rainy_Day_Pam: I don't wanna go outside in this weather$s...#$e#I'll just do some things around the house.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Pam: Hope you stayed dry today, hun.#$e#Looks pretty nasty outside.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Pam: Mornin', sweetie pie. Another day of farm chores, huh?#$e#I'll have dinner ready for you later.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Pam: Here, sweetie. I warmed this up for dinner. [206]
Entries.Outdoor_Pam: Hey, hun. Sure is a nice day, huh?
Entries.spring_Pam: Ugh... my spring allergies are back with a vengeance.$s
Entries.summer_Pam: *sigh* All this sweating... Why even bother putting on any makeup in the first place?$s
Entries.fall_Pam: All these leaves falling all over the place...#$e#Sure they're pretty, but raking them up is a real pain.
Entries.winter_Pam: Wanna curl up by the fireplace, snookums?$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Make sure you stay dry, snookums. Can't have you catchin' ammonia on me!
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Mornin'.$h#$e#Here, snookums. A nice, strong cup of coffee. [395]
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: I'm not much of a cook, but here, sweetie pie. Have something to eat. [194 195 210 211 216]
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I don't wanna go outside in this weather$s...#$e#I'll just do some things around the house.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Hope you stayed dry today, hun.#$e#Looks pretty nasty outside.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Hey, you're home. Let's stay inside tonight.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I warmed up some soup. Hope it turned out okay. [199 218 219 727 730]$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Ah... The sound of rain... I'm gonna sleep well tonight.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Mornin', sweetie pie. Another day of farm chores, huh?#$e#I'll have dinner ready for you later.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, hun. I warmed these up for breakfast. [234]
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I oughta go visit Penny pretty soon.#$e#I bet she's lonely in that ol' trailer without me.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: What're you up to today, snookums? Anything interesting?
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Kick back 'n' relax, snookums! You did a lotta work today.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Here, sweetie. I warmed this up for dinner. [206]
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Ready for bed, hun?#$e#I just finished makin' it.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: C'mere, sweetie pie. Lemme rub your feet.#$e#You've been on 'em all day. They gotta be sore.$h
Entries.Outdoor_0: Hey... don't work too hard, snookums.$h
Entries.Outdoor_1: You're doin' a great job, sweetie pie. I'm rootin' for ya.$7
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hey, hun. Sure is a nice day, huh?
Entries.OneKid_0: I never thought I'd had another kid after Penny.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Another kiddo callin' me Mom, huh...?#$e#I'm pretty happy.$h
Entries.TwoKids_0: Penny's pretty excited to meet her new lil' siblings.$h#$e#Heck, she'll be their teacher here in a few years.$6
Entries.TwoKids_1: You're a great father, snookums.$h^You're a great mother, snookums.$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: We got a perfect little family, don't we, @?$h
Entries.Good_0: You're sure lookin' handsome today.$7^You're sure lookin' lovely today.$7
Entries.Good_1: You sure are a looker, y'know that?$7#$e#C'mere and kiss me, silly.$5
Entries.Good_2: We make a killer pair, don't we?$h
Entries.Good_3: I never thought I'd get married, but you went 'n' proved me wrong, didn't ya?$h
Entries.Good_4: Taking that bouquet from you was a pretty good decision, eh?$7
Entries.Neutral_0: I've lost weight. Have you noticed?#$e#I must be eating healthier.
Entries.Neutral_1: It sure gets dusty in 'ere fast.
Entries.Neutral_2: Got anything important to do today, hun?#$e#I gotta go to Pierre's pretty soon.
Entries.Bad_2: You've been treatin' me like garbage.$4#$e#...Now I remember why I stayed single for so long.$s
Entries.funLeave_Pam: I'm headin' out today, snookums.#$e#Don't miss me too much!$7
Entries.funReturn_Pam: Missed ya today, sweetie.#$e#Glad to be back.$h
Entries.spring_1: Happy New Year, hun. Let's hope for a good one.$h
Entries.spring_12: You're pretty good at that egg hunt, right?#$e#Win me a prize, hun.$h
Entries.spring_23: I broke out the ol' dress just for tomorrow, snookums. We'll show the young'uns how it's done.$7
Entries.summer_1: Ugh... The summer heat. It ain't good for an old girl like me.$s
Entries.summer_10: Put beer in the soup tomorrow, snookums!$7#$e#Every time I do, the governor just loves the heck outta it.$h
Entries.summer_27: Oh yeah... Tomorrow's a festival, huh?#$e#Those glowing jellyfish... They're a sight, ain't they?
Entries.fall_1: Fall's a real good time for good food and good beer.$h
Entries.fall_15: The food at the fair's to die for.$7
Entries.fall_26: Bring on the maze tomorrow! I ain't afraid of ghosts.$h
Entries.winter_1: Sure got cold fast, eh?#$e#Better keep me warm this winter, snookums.$7
Entries.winter_7: I love you, hun, but I'm gonna kick your butt tomorrow.$h
Entries.winter_24: Can't wait to eat Gus' cooking at the festival tomorrow.#$e#The feast is the best part of the year!$h
Entries.winter_28: Can't believe the year's almost over.#$e#Cheers, hun. Here's to another year together. [346]$7
Entries.spouseRoom_Pam: #$c .5#I just wanna laze around and watch TV today...
Entries.patio_Pam: Never thought I'd wanna keep a flower garden.#$e#It's surprisingly calming.$h

Entries.marriage_Sun.000: I figured I'd come say hi to Penny.
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Hey, snookums. Figured I'd come give a nod to ol' Gus.
Entries.marriage_Tue.000: Hey, sweetie pie. Just doin' some shopping.
Entries.marriage_Tue.001: You need anything from here, sweetie?
Entries.marriage_Tue.002: Hey, wait up for me, sweetie. I'm almost done here.
Entries.marriage_Tue.003: Just gotta pay and I'll head home. See ya there, snookums.
Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hey, snookums. Need a ride to the desert?
Entries.marriage_Wed.000: Hiya, sweetie pie. Another day of work... I'll be home before ya know it.

Entries.Pam0: You sure are a weird kid... wantin' to marry an old girl like me.#$e#What? I'm not complaining!$h
Entries.Pam1: Penny's gonna be fine on 'er own... She's a responsible girl.#$e#Are you ready to be a step-parent?$h

Entries.pennyDinner: Dear @,^I know things have been weird between us since I found out about you and my mom. I'm sorry for blowing up at the two of you a while back. I want to make it up to you.^Come by the trailer today. There's a surprise for you!^^   Love,^   Penny
